argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` R ) = ( Base ` R ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` S ) = ( Base ` S ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_rimrhm | |- ( F e. ( R RingIso S ) -> F e. ( R RingHom S ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_rhmghm | |- ( F e. ( R RingHom S ) -> F e. ( R GrpHom S ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_syl | |- ( F e. ( R RingIso S ) -> F e. ( R GrpHom S ) ) |
| 6 | 1, 2 | #P_rimf1o | |- ( F e. ( R RingIso S ) -> F : ( Base ` R ) -1-1-onto-> ( Base ` S ) ) |
| 7 | 1, 2 | #P_isgim | |- ( F e. ( R GrpIso S ) <-> ( F e. ( R GrpHom S ) /\ F : ( Base ` R ) -1-1-onto-> ( Base ` S ) ) ) |
| 8 | 5, 6, 7 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( F e. ( R RingIso S ) -> F e. ( R GrpIso S ) ) |
